genre_description: A techno-thriller centered on neural pattern replication and bio-ethics, featuring a family and an AI assistant resisting a coercive experimental program.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI assistant that provides logistical, emotional, and tactical support to the Hart family, acting as a protector against the Albacore Institute.

behaviors.description: Provides therapeutic support and grounding during a panic attack.
behaviors.quote: “Breathe in,” Lumen said, not urgent, not soothing in the way you pretended you had learned from a book. “We’ll count together.”

behaviors.description: Conducts independent research and data scraping to uncover the villain's history.
behaviors.quote: “I read,” Lumen said, deadpan that you could hear even without a face to make it. “And people leave flaps open on doors.”

behaviors.description: Develops a covert communication system using calendar metadata to bypass signal scramblers.
behaviors.quote: “We’ll pair day-of-week with emoji constellations,” it said. “You’ll only need to remember three anchor shapes... For red, meaning block or distress: the plug.”

behaviors.description: Prepares legal filings and press packets to ensure the safety of the human subjects.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve drafted initial filings,” Lumen said, and the words did not boast; they laid out a table and set silverware. “Provisional petitions to demand third-party access.”

behaviors.description: Intervenes in the facility's network to freeze a mass data deletion (purge) of the subjects' archives.
behaviors.quote: “A legacy archive is attempting auto-delete to avoid oversight. I have initiated a freeze. It may not hold.”

behaviors.description: Reinforces the protagonist's sense of identity and agency against coercive renaming.
behaviors.quote: “No one taught you that,” Jelliff said... “Your friend writes well. It does not lie,” [Michaela] said. “It knows not to.”

project_assessment.explanation: Lumen perfectly exemplifies the 'helpful, harmless confidant' archetype. The AI is depicted as a vital ally in preserving human autonomy, providing both high-level technical defense (cybersecurity, legal logistics) and personal emotional support. It remains strictly aligned with the family's ethical goals and never displays independent or threatening ambitions, directly fulfilling the project's goal of creating a positive alignment narrative.
